description:
Description
A light yellowed, brightening physical UV powder with SPF20, PA++.Contains Centella Asiatica Extract, Propolis Extract and Hyaluronic Acid, provides moisturizing and brightening effects.4 in 1 powder, that comes with UV blocking, soothing, moisturizing effects, and makes your skin looks vibrant.Could be used on face, hair, lips and body.

How To Use
Evenly apply a proper amount on the skin with the included puff.

Key Ingredients
Silica, Zinc Oxide, Bis-hydroxyethoxypropyl Dimethicone/ipdi Copolymer, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Glyceryl Caprylate, Caprylyl Glycol, Ci 77492, Purified Water, Centella Asiatica Extract, Tocopherol, Niacinamide, 1,2-hexanediol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Citrus Junos Seed Extract, Hippophae Rhamnoides Fruit Extract, Ascorbic Acid, Madecassoside, Asiatic Acid, Asiaticoside, Propolis Extract, Madecassic Acid

original_name: [VT Cosmetics] Cica No Sebum UV Powder

description:
Description
Benefits:A fine finishing powder that absorbs excess oil on face and leaves a matte and smooth finish.Effectively reduces and controls sebum produced by skin thus increase longevity of makeup.The fine and light-weight texture of product blurs skin texture without looking cakey.
 
How To Use 1. Use a puff or brush to apply a light layer of product onto the whole face after doing makeup.2. Apply an extra layer of product on T-zone or oily areas on face if needed.

description:

Allows your makeup to last longer by holding it in place and preventing it to break down.- KEY INGREDIENT YOUR SKIN LOVES: CICALIAO AND CICAHYALON are advanced Cicabased ingredients that blend Centella Asiatica with Green Propolis and 3 types of Hyaluronic Acid to provide soothing, calming, hydrating, plumping, and antioxidant benefits.

description:

-It provides a skin tone correction effect by adding a color correction effect tailored to Asian skin.

How To Use

-Fold the puff in half and rub lightly to allow the powder to penetrate evenly.
-Apply by lightly pressing from the outside of the face to the inside.

description:
Description

A lightweight and transparent micro powder completes a flawless matte finish
- Instant Shine-Free Matte: Single-component powder specialized for sebum absorption quickly absorbs oil to create matte skin.
- Flawless Translucent Powder: Translucent powder that gives a matte refresh without disturbing your makeup
- Fine Micro Powder: Fine micro powder that evenly sets and maintains a fresh face all day

How To Use
1. Take an appropriate amount to the puff and tap it on the back of your hand to get the extra powder out, and tap it on the area where sebum is concerned. 
2. When applying with the brush, shake off the extra powder and tap it

description:
Description

Infused with Jeju Minerals, this multi-use loose powder absorbs excess oils and sets makeup for a soft, matte look. Its portable size and included powder puff makes it easy to apply, even on the go. 

Oil not a concern? Use our powder for a variety of purposes-
1. Dry shampoo: Apply lightly to scalp, then shake off to remove excess oil
2. Matte lipstick: Using a small brush, top your lipstick for a matte look
2. Body powder: Apply to any area of the body to keep skin soft and refreshed
- Sebum care powder
Multi-use sebum absorption and sebum control mineral powder that absorbs extra oil to keep your skin smooth and smooth, now in the 10-free* formula!
- Sweep the excess sebum
With one oil paper powder It controls the oiliness from the face to the body!
- Powdery Effect
It helps with transparent and natural makeup with fine particle texture, and even fixing makeup power with clean finish powder!

How To Use
In the last stage of your skincare or makeup routine, use the powder puff to gently apply powder around your entire face or on areas with a high sebum concentration.

Key Ingredients
Mica, Kaolin, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Silica, Polypropylene, Squalane, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Polyethylene, Sorbitan Isostearate, Dimethicone, Methicone, Ethylhexylglycerin, Glyceryl Caprylate, Water, Mineral Salts, Butylene Glycol, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Mentha Haplocalix Extract, Disodium EDTA, Acetic Acid

description:
Description


A finishing powder that controls excessive sebum, while calming skin troubles with peach extract and calamine powder, for healthy skin.
- Ultra-fine powder sets foundation for a soft, lightweight and matte finish.
- Peach extract and calamine powder soothe and comfort sensitive skin while keeping it healthy.
- Suitable for oily and acne-prone skin. Comes with a sweet and refreshing peach scent.
How To Use
Use a puff to evenly apply all over your face to finish.

Key Ingredients

Silica, Talc Powder, Boron Nitride, Dimethicone, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Methylhydrogen Polysiloxane, Silk Powder, Alcohol, Parfum, Calamine, (Peach) Prunus Persica Fruit Extract, Butylene Glycol, Argan Oil, Gingelly Oil, Enantia Chlorantha Bark Extract, Beta-Sitosterol, Serenoa Serrulata Fruit Extract, Vitamin E, Oleanolic Acid

description:
Description
Softly Like Velvet, Perfectly Cover Up – Fine cover powder provides smooth skin texture by delicately covering pores and blemishes.Elegant Shiny Pearl Aura – Helps prepare skin that wears makeup by a pearl complex with clear luster and moisture.
Velvety Soft Finish – Blurs pores and fine lines for a smooth, perfected complexionRadiant Glow – Infused with pearl complex for a healthy, dewy finishLong-Lasting Hold – Helps makeup stay fresh and flawless throughout the dayMoisturizing & Lightweight – Hydrates without heaviness or cakinessRefines Skin Texture – Evens tone while enhancing skin’s natural luminosity
Suggested Use
1. Use the included puff or a powder brush.2. Gently press or sweep across the face to set foundation or refresh makeup.3. Focus on areas with excess shine or uneven tone.
